sources.title: Supersonic Saucer
sources.description: Title: Supersonic Saucer Summary: A group of schoolchildren come upon an alien from Venus, and help him against a gang of criminals who are trying to kidnap him. Directed by: Guy Fergusson Actors: Marcia Manolescue, Gillian Harrison, Fella Edmonds Production Company: Children's Film Foundation (CFF) Release Date: March 1956 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A group of schoolchildren come upon an alien from Venus, and help him against a gang of criminals who are trying to kidnap him.

metadata.Plot: A group of schoolchildren come upon an alien from Venus, and help him against a gang of criminals who are trying to kidnap him.
metadata.Actors: Marcia Manolescue, Gillian Harrison, Fella Edmonds
